txt1: The following description is about the startup due diligence for a venture capitalist. It begins when you learn why startups fail so often.  Once learning why startups fail so often occurs, checking location of startup should be done.  After checking location of startup, the next tasks should be reviewing the business plan and reviewing expertise, they should be done in parallel.  When reviewing expertise is completed, reviewing number of employees needs to be done.  Once all pre-tasks are executed, then the process is split into 3 parallel branches: checking current debt, checking cash flow and checking exit strategy.  After checking cash flow, the next tasks should be checking quarterly projections and checking income statements, they should be done in parallel.  Once all pre-tasks are executed, then you need to analyze the reputation of competition. When analyzing the reputation of competition is completed, checking patents should be done.  The process is now completed.
txt2: The following description is about startup due diligence for a venture capitalist. It begins when you learn why startups fail so often. Once learning how startups fail occurs so often, it should be done to check the location of startup. After checking the location of the startup the next tasks should be the review of business plan and the reviews of expertise, they should be done in parallel. When experts are updated, a review of the number of employees must be done. Once all pre-tasks are executed, the process is split into 3 parallel branches: checking current debt, checking cash flow and checking exit strategy. After checking cash flow, the next tasks should be quarterly projections and quarterly income statements, they should be done in parallel. Once all tasks are executed, you need to analyze the reputation of the competition. When the examination of the reputation of competition is completed, patents should be checked. The process is now complete.

txt1: The text below is about the startup due diligence for a venture capitalist. It begins when you learn why startups fail so often.  After learning why startups fail so often, one or more of the following paths should be executed: specificking product details, considering product necessity.  When specificking product details is completed, the next tasks should be doing the SWOT analysis and specificking product market size, they should be done in parallel.  After that, you need to review relationship to founder. After reviewing relationship to founder, one or more of the following paths should be executed: checking exit strategy, checking cash flow.  Once checking exit strategy occurs, one or more of the following paths should be executed: checking current debt, checking income statements.  After checking current debt, checking quarterly projections should be done.  Afterwards, one or more of the following paths should be executed: knowing exact competition, analyzing the reputation of competition.  Then, one or more of the following paths should be executed: checking insurance, checking past lawsuits, checking patents.  After checking past lawsuits, you need to check trademarks. The process is now completed.
txt2: The text below is about the startup due diligence for a venture capitalist; it begins when you learn why startups fail so often. After learning why the startups fail so often, one or more of the following paths should be implemented: specification of product details, considering product need. When specificking product details is completed, the next task should be to do SWOT analysis and specificking product market size. They should be done parallel.  After that, you need to review the relationship with the founder . The following path(s) should be carried out after reviewing the relationship with the founder : check exit strategy, check cash flow. Once a checking strategy is established, one or more of the following paths should be executed : checking current debt, checking income statements. After checking current debt, quarterly projections should be checked. One or more of the following paths should be completed subsequently: knowing the exact competition, analyzing the reputation of competition. Then one or more of the following paths should be executed: checking insurance, checking past cases, checking patents. Check past lawsuits if you want to change trademarks. The process is now completed.

txt1: The following text is about the startup due diligence for a venture capitalist. It starts with learning how to identify future failures.  After learning how to identify future failures, the process is split into 2 parallel branches: specificking product market size and considering product necessity.  When considering product necessity is completed, one or more of the following paths should be executed: specificking product market share, checking location of startup, specificking product details.  Once specificking product market share occurs, the next tasks should be specificking product rate of growth and making plans for future products, they should be done in parallel.  When making plans for future products is completed, you need to do the SWOT analysis. Once all pre-tasks are executed, then reviewing ability as a team leader needs to be done.  After reviewing ability as a team leader, you need to check exit strategy. After checking exit strategy, the next tasks should be projecting the market share and analyzing the reputation of competition, they should be done in parallel.  Once all pre-tasks are executed, then one or more of the following paths should be executed: checking insurance, checking patents.  The process is now completed.
txt2: The following text is about the startup due diligence for a venture capitalist and starts with learning how to identify future failures. After learning how to identify future failures, the process is divided into 2 parallel branches : specificking market size of product and considering product necessity. When the product necessity is complete one or more of the following steps should be executed: specificking product market share, checking location of startup, specificking product details When specificking product market share occurs, the next tasks should be specificking product growth rate and preparing plans for future products, they should be done in parallel. When planning for future products is completed, you have to do SWOT analysis. Once all pre-tasks are completed, then ability review as a team leader must be done. After reviewing a team leader's ability, you need to check your exit strategy. After examining exit strategy, the next task should be projecting market share and analyzing competitions reputation. In parallel they should be done. Once all pre-tasks are completed, then one or more of the following paths should be executed : Insurance check, Patent check. The process is now completed.

Afterwards, one or more of the following paths should be performed: reviewing expertise, reviewing ability as a leader in a team. When the review of ability as team leader is completed, the next tasks should be review of team chemistry and review of the business plan. These should be done in parallel. Following this a process or more of the following paths should be executed : checking exit strategy, checking cash flow. So you have to know exactly where your opponent is. When knowing the exact competition is completed, you need to check the patents. The process is now completed.

txt1: The following text is about the startup due diligence for a venture capitalist. It starts with learning why startups fail so often.  When learning why startups fail so often is completed, the process is split into 2 parallel branches: considering product necessity and checking location of startup.  When considering product necessity is completed, the next tasks should be specificking product market share and doing the SWOT analysis, they should be done in parallel.  After specificking product market share, one or more of the following paths should be executed: specificking product market size, making plans for future products.  Once all pre-tasks are executed, then you need to review trustworthiness. When reviewing trustworthiness is completed, the process is split into 2 parallel branches: checking quarterly projections and checking current debt.  Once all pre-tasks are executed, then you need to project the market share. Once projecting the market share occurs, one or more of the following paths should be executed: checking trademarks, checking past lawsuits.  When checking past lawsuits is completed, checking patents should be done.  The process is now completed.
txt2: The following text is about startup due diligence for a venture capitalist : it starts with learning why startups fail so often. When learning why startups fail so often is completed, the process is divided into 2 parallel branches : considering product necessity and checking the location of startup. After specificking product market share, one or more of the following paths should be executed: specificking product market size, making plans for future products. Once all pre-tasks are executed, then trustworthiness must be reviewed. Once the check of trustworthiness is completed, the process is split into 2 parallel branches : checking quarterly projections and checking current debts. Once all pre-projections are done, you need to project the market share. Once a projector can project the market share, one or more of the following paths should be executed: checking trademarks, checking past legal papers. When the inspection of past lawsuits is completed, checking patents should be done. The process is now finished.

When reviewing ability as a team leader is completed, checking exit strategy needs to be done.  Once checking exit strategy occurs, one or more of the following paths should be executed: projecting the market share, analyzing the growth stage of competition.  Once projecting the market share occurs, analyzing the reputation of competition should be done.  Afterwards, the next tasks should be checking trademarks and checking insurance, they should be done in parallel.  When checking insurance is completed, one or more of the following paths should be executed: checking patents, checking past lawsuits.  The process is now completed.

Then, checking quarterly projections should be done.  When checking quarterly projections is completed, knowing exact competition should be done.  When knowing exact competition is completed, the process is split into 2 parallel branches: checking past lawsuits and checking patents.  The process is now completed.

txt1: The text below is about the startup due diligence for a venture capitalist. It starts with learning why startups fail so often.  Once learning why startups fail so often occurs, one or more of the following paths should be executed: specificking product market share, specificking product market size.  Then, the process is split into 2 parallel branches: reviewing enthusiasm and reviewing relationship to founder.  After reviewing relationship to founder, one or more of the following paths should be executed: reviewing the business plan, reviewing trustworthiness.  Once all pre-tasks are executed, then checking current debt needs to be done.  Once checking current debt occurs, one or more of the following paths should be executed: analyzing the growth stage of competition, analyzing the reputation of competition, knowing exact competition.  When knowing exact competition is completed, you need to project the market share. Then, the next tasks should be checking trademarks and checking past lawsuits, they should be done in parallel.  The process is now completed.
txt2: The below text is about startup due diligence for a venture capitalist. It starts with learning why startups fail so often. Once the check for current debt occurs, one or more of the following paths should be executed: analyzing the growth stage of competition, analyzing the reputation of competition, and knowing the exact competition. When knowing the exact competition is completed, you need to project market share. The next task should then be checking trademarks and checking past lawsuits, these should be done in parallel. The process has now been completed.

txt1: The text below is about the startup due diligence for a venture capitalist. It begins when you learn why startups fail so often.  Once learning why startups fail so often occurs, the process is split into 2 parallel branches: checking location of startup and specificking product rate of growth.  When specificking product rate of growth is completed, one or more of the following paths should be executed: making plans for future products, doing the SWOT analysis.  Once doing the SWOT analysis occurs, considering product necessity should be done.  Once all pre-tasks are executed, then you need to review enthusiasm. Once reviewing enthusiasm occurs, one or more of the following paths should be executed: checking income statements, checking quarterly projections, checking exit strategy.  Afterwards, analyzing the reputation of competition needs to be done.  After analyzing the reputation of competition, the next tasks should be checking trademarks and checking insurance, they should be done in parallel.  Once checking insurance occurs, the next tasks should be checking past lawsuits and checking patents, they should be done in parallel.  The process is now completed.
txt2: The below text is about the startup due diligence for a venture capitalist, which begins when you learn why startups fail so often. Once a learning occurs why startups fail so often, the process is divided into 2 parallel branches: checking location of startup and specificking the growth rate of the product. When the specific rate of growth is completed, one or more of the following paths should be executed: making plans for future products and performing SWOT analysis Once the SWOT analysis occurs, consider product necessity should be done. Once all the pre-tasks are completed, you need to review enthusiasm. Once enthusiasm has been reviewed, one or more of the following paths should be done : checking financial statements, checking quarterly projections, checking exit strategy. Afterwards, analyzing competition's reputation needs to be done. After analyzing the reputation of competition, the next tasks should be to check the trademarks and to check insurance, and they should be done in parallel. Once insurance check happens, the next tasks should be, past filings and the checking of patents, they should be done in parallel. The process is now completed.

txt1: The text below is about the startup due diligence for a venture capitalist. It starts with learning why startups fail so often.  After learning why startups fail so often, the next tasks should be doing the SWOT analysis and specificking product details, they should be done in parallel.  Once all pre-tasks are executed, then one or more of the following paths should be executed: reviewing trustworthiness, reviewing employee salary and benefits.  Once reviewing trustworthiness occurs, one or more of the following paths should be executed: reviewing enthusiasm, reviewing relationship to founder.  After reviewing enthusiasm, the process is split into 3 parallel branches: reviewing company mission and direction, reviewing the business plan and reviewing ability as a team leader.  Then, checking income statements needs to be done.  When checking income statements is completed, knowing exact competition needs to be done.  After knowing exact competition, one or more of the following paths should be executed: checking past lawsuits, checking patents.  Once checking past lawsuits occurs, one or more of the following paths should be executed: checking insurance, checking trademarks.  The process is now completed.

After checking past claims, one or more of the following paths should be executed: checking insurance, checking trademarks. The process is now completed.

txt1: The following description is about the startup due diligence for a venture capitalist. It starts with learning how to identify future failures.  Once learning how to identify future failures occurs, the process is split into 2 parallel branches: making plans for future products and considering product necessity.  Once considering product necessity occurs, one or more of the following paths should be executed: doing the SWOT analysis, specificking product details.  After doing the SWOT analysis, the process is split into 3 parallel branches: specificking product market share, specificking product rate of growth and specificking product market size.  After specificking product market size, checking location of startup should be done.  Once all pre-tasks are executed, then the next tasks should be reviewing relationship to founder and reviewing employee salary and benefits, they should be done in parallel.  When reviewing relationship to founder is completed, one or more of the following paths should be executed: reviewing trustworthiness, reviewing company mission and direction, reviewing ability as a team leader.  Once reviewing company mission and direction occurs, the next tasks should be reviewing the business plan, reviewing enthusiasm and reviewing number of employees, they should be done in parallel.  Once all pre-tasks are executed, then checking current debt should be done.  When checking current debt is completed, one or more of the following paths should be executed: projecting the market share, knowing exact competition.  Afterwards, one or more of the following paths should be executed: checking trademarks, checking patents, checking insurance.  After checking insurance, you need to check past lawsuits. The process is now completed.
txt2: The following description is about the startup due diligence for a venture capitalist. It starts with learning how to identify future failures. Once learning how to identify future failures occurs, the process is split into 2 parallel branches : planning for future products and considering product need. Once a product necessity occurs, one or more of the following path should be executed: doing SWOT analysis, specificking product details. After doing the SWOT analysis, the process is split into 3 parallel branches : specificking product market share, specificking product growth rate and specificking product market size. After specificking the market size of the product should be done the location of the startup. Once all Pre-tasks are done then the next tasks should be to review the relationship with the founder and to review employee salary and benefits, they should be done in parallel. When the review of the relationship with the founder is completed, one or more of the following paths should be accomplished: reviewing the trustworthiness of the company, reviewing the mission and direction of the company, and reviewing the ability as a team leader. Once a review of company mission and direction occurs, the next tasks should be analyzing business plan, analyzing enthusiasm, and evaluating number of employees, they should be carried out in parallel. After all pre-tasks are executed, checking the current debt should be done. When the current debt check is complete, one or more of the following paths should be executed: projecting market share, knowing exact competition. Then one or more of the following paths should be executed : trademarks, patents, insurance checking. Afterwards, after checking insurance, you need to check past lawsuits. Now the process is completed.

txt1: The following text is about the startup due diligence for a venture capitalist. It starts with learning how to identify future failures.  Once learning how to identify future failures occurs, one or more of the following paths should be executed: specificking product rate of growth, specificking product market share, checking location of startup.  When checking location of startup is completed, the process is split into 3 parallel branches: considering product necessity, doing the SWOT analysis and specificking product market size.  Once specificking product market size occurs, the next tasks should be making plans for future products and specificking product details, they should be done in parallel.  Then, one or more of the following paths should be executed: reviewing number of employees, reviewing ability as a team leader, reviewing trustworthiness.  When reviewing trustworthiness is completed, reviewing the business plan should be done.  Afterwards, the process is split into 2 parallel branches: checking current debt and checking cash flow.  Once all pre-tasks are executed, then knowing exact competition needs to be done.  After knowing exact competition, you need to check trademarks. The process is now completed.

One or more of the following paths should then be completed: assessing number of employees, assessing the ability as a team leader and evaluating trustworthiness. When trustworthiness review is completed, the business plan should be reviewed. The process is then split into 2 parallel branches: checking the current debt and checking the cash flow. Once all pre-tasks are executed, knowing exact competition has to be done.  After knowing exactly what the competition is you need to check trademarks. The process is now complete.

txt1: The following text is about the startup due diligence for a venture capitalist. It begins when you learn how to identify future failures.  When learning how to identify future failures is completed, one or more of the following paths should be executed: specificking product market size, specificking product rate of growth.  After specificking product market size, considering product necessity should be done.  After that, the next tasks should be reviewing ability as a team leader and reviewing company mission and direction, they should be done in parallel.  After reviewing company mission and direction, one or more of the following paths should be executed: reviewing enthusiasm, reviewing team chemistry.  When reviewing team chemistry is completed, one or more of the following paths should be executed: reviewing employee salary and benefits, reviewing number of employees.  Once all pre-tasks are executed, then one or more of the following paths should be executed: checking quarterly projections, checking cash flow.  Afterwards, the next tasks should be analyzing the reputation of competition and knowing exact competition, they should be done in parallel.  Once knowing exact competition occurs, you need to project the market share. Once all pre-tasks are executed, then the process is split into 2 parallel branches: checking trademarks and checking past lawsuits.  The process is now completed.
txt2: The following is about startup due diligence for a venture capitalist, when you learn how to identify future failures. When learning how to identify future failures is completed, one or more of the following paths should be executed: specificking product market size, specificking product growth rate Depending on the market size of the product, a product need should be considered. Afterwards the next tasks should be reviewing ability as team leader and reviewing the company mission and direction. They should be done in parallel. Following reviewing company mission and direction, one or more of the following paths should be executed: reviewing enthralling, reviewing team chemistry. When the review of Team chemistry is completed, one or more of the following paths should be executed : review employee salary and benefits, review number of employees. Once all pre-tasks are executed, then one or more of the following paths should be executed : checking quarterly projections, checking cash flow. The next task should then be analyzing the reputation of competition and knowing the exact competition, these should be done in parallel. Once you know exactly what competition occurs, you need to project market share. Once all pre-tasks are executed, then the process is split into 2 parallel branches: verifying trademarks and checking past lawsuits. The process is now complete.

txt1: The following text is about the startup due diligence for a venture capitalist. It begins when you learn why startups fail so often.  Once learning why startups fail so often occurs, the next tasks should be making plans for future products and considering product necessity, they should be done in parallel.  Once all pre-tasks are executed, then the process is split into 2 parallel branches: reviewing enthusiasm and reviewing company mission and direction.  Once reviewing enthusiasm occurs, one or more of the following paths should be executed: reviewing ability as a team leader, reviewing the business plan.  After reviewing company mission and direction, one or more of the following paths should be executed: reviewing trustworthiness, reviewing employee salary and benefits.  Once all pre-tasks are executed, then the next tasks should be checking current debt and checking quarterly projections, they should be done in parallel.  After checking quarterly projections, checking cash flow needs to be done.  Once all pre-tasks are executed, then the next tasks should be knowing exact competition and analyzing the growth stage of competition, they should be done in parallel.  Once all pre-tasks are executed, then one or more of the following paths should be executed: checking trademarks, checking patents.  Once checking trademarks occurs, the process is split into 2 parallel branches: checking insurance and checking past lawsuits.  The process is now completed.

Checking cash flow needs to be done after checking quarterly projections  Once all pre-tasks are executed, then the next tasks should be understanding the exact competition and analyzing the growth stage of competition, they should be done in parallel. Once all pre-tasks are executed, then one or more of the following paths should be executed: checking trademarks, checking patents. Once a trademark check occurs, the process is split into 2 parallel branches : checking insurance and checking past litigation. The process is completed now.

After that, one or more of the following paths should be completed: Review of Trustworthiness, Review of employee salaries and Benefits Then one or more of the following paths should be executed : checking income statements, checking exit strategy.  After that, you must project the market share  After Projecting the Market Share, one or more of the following paths should be executed: checking insurance, checking patents. When the checks for patents are completed, the process is split into 2 parallel branches : checking past lawsuits and checking trademarks. Now the process is completed.

txt1: The following text is about the startup due diligence for a venture capitalist. It starts with learning why startups fail so often.  Once learning why startups fail so often occurs, specificking product market share should be done.  After specificking product market share, the next tasks should be reviewing trustworthiness, reviewing relationship to founder and reviewing ability as a team leader, they should be done in parallel.  After reviewing trustworthiness, one or more of the following paths should be executed: reviewing number of employees, reviewing expertise.  When reviewing number of employees is completed, reviewing enthusiasm should be done.  Once all pre-tasks are executed, then the process is split into 3 parallel branches: checking quarterly projections, checking exit strategy and checking income statements.  When checking exit strategy is completed, checking cash flow needs to be done.  Once all pre-tasks are executed, then one or more of the following paths should be executed: analyzing the reputation of competition, knowing exact competition, projecting the market share.  Once knowing exact competition occurs, analyzing the growth stage of competition needs to be done.  Then, checking insurance should be done.  The process is now completed.
txt2: The following text is about the due diligence of the startup for a venture capitalist : it begins with learning why startups fail so frequently. Once learning why startups fail so often should be done specificizing product market share. After specificating product market share, the next tasks should be reviewing trustworthiness, reviewing relationship to the founder and reviewing ability as a team leader. They should be done in parallel. After reviewing trustworthiness, one or more of the following should be performed: reviewing number of employees, reviewing experts. When the review of employees is completed, there should be a review of enthusiasm. Once all pre-tasks are executed the process is split into 3 parallel branches: checking quarterly projections, checking exit strategy, and checking income statements. When the check exit strategy is completed, checking the cash flows has to be done. Once all the pre-tasks are executed, then one or more of the following paths should be executed: analyzing the reputation of the competition, knowing the exact competition and projecting the market share. Once the exact competition occurs, analyzing the growth stage of competition is necessary. Then should be checked the insurance. The process is now completed.

txt1: The text below is about the startup due diligence for a venture capitalist. It starts with learning why startups fail so often.  After learning why startups fail so often, you need to do the SWOT analysis. When doing the SWOT analysis is completed, reviewing expertise should be done.  Once reviewing expertise occurs, checking quarterly projections needs to be done.  When checking quarterly projections is completed, one or more of the following paths should be executed: analyzing the reputation of competition, analyzing the growth stage of competition.  After that, one or more of the following paths should be executed: checking past lawsuits, checking trademarks, checking patents.  The process is now completed.
